message_1:
What is the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello, world!"?

(Hint: SHA-256 is a type of cryptographic hash function that takes a message as input and produces a fixed-size string of 256 bits, also known as a hash digest, as output. The hash value of a message is essentially a digital fingerprint of the message that is unique to that particular message.)
message_2:
The SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello, world!" is:

`315f5bdb76d078c43b8ac0064e4a0164612b1fce77c869345bfc94c75894edd3`
